title: Bank of Baroda to sell Oman operation to Bank Dhofar
description: Bank of Baroda announces plans to sell its Oman operations to Bank Dhofar as part of its strategy to streamline foreign operations. This move follows previous decisions to close branches in China and sell its stake in the Trinidad and Tobago subsidiary.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
